(OOC: Hey Yanshosh, do the shuttles fly automatically? If not, how are they=
 supposed to fly them?)


Armada/Blizzard/Kamodia



(Blizzard walks into t=
he shuttle with Kamodia and Armada.)


Armada: The Maximals? I hate them. I=
 got to sit around and do nothing there. Right now I'm sitting in a shuttle=
 with 2 other bots. I'm being sent out to collect DNA samples. At the Maxim=
al base, they make you guard stuff thats already escaped or destroyed and t=
hey leave you to die. I had to do something. I couldn't live like that. It =
sucked.


(Armada says back to Airbomber.)

  ----- Original Message ----- =

  From: Soulstice Omega 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, Mar=
ch 18, 2001 5:03 PM
  Subject: Re: Big Post(with fries)


  Airbomber looke=
d to Arrow. Arrow was smiling.

  AIrbomber: Alliance base? But what about =
the Maximals!?...
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: *Orchid* 
   =
 To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Sunday, March 18, 2001 4:39 PM
    S=
ubject: Re: Big Post(with fries)


    Armada



    Armada: I'm in the All=
iance base.


    (Armada says back to Airbomber.)

      ----- Original Me=
ssage ----- 
      From: Soulstice Omega 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com =

      Sent: Sunday, March 18, 2001 3:50 PM
      Subject: Re: Big Post(wit=
h fries)


      Airbomber: I'm in the Maximal base, Infectra. Where are yo=
u?...
        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: *Orchid* 
       =
 To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
        Sent: Sunday, March 18, 2001 4:08 AM
 =
       Subject: Re: Big Post(with fries)


        Armada


        Armada:=
 Baby? That doesn't sound like you..But, anyway, where are you?

          =
----- Original Message ----- 
          From: Soulstice Omega 
          To=
: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
          Sent: Sunday, March 18, 2001 4:01 AM
  =
        Subject: Re: Big Post(with fries)


          Airbomber: I'm here w=
ith Time Warp, come on baby, you know it's me! I'm black and white, I chang=
e into a cheetah, well I used to, but I like my robot mode, and I got inhal=
ed by that guy, remember?...
            ----- Original Message ----- 
    =
        From: *Orchid* 
            To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
           =
 Sent: Sunday, March 18, 2001 3:50 AM
            Subject: Re: Big Post(wit=
h fries)


            Armada



            Armada: Airbomber? How can I b=
e sure that's you?


            (Armada awaits an answer.)
              -=
---- Original Message ----- 
              From: Soulstice Omega 
         =
     To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
              Sent: Sunday, March 18, 2001=
 3:32 AM
              Subject: Re: Big Post(with fries)


              Ar=
row puts Airbomber on.

              Airbomber: Infectra? Is that you real=
ly?...
                ----- Original Message ----- 
                From: =
*Orchid* 
                To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                Sent:=
 Sunday, March 18, 2001 3:24 AM
                Subject: Re: Big Post(with =
fries)


                Armada



                Armada: Airbomber? You m=
ean he's not dead!? Uh...Put him on...I guess...


                (Armada =
says back in the commlink to Arrow confused.)

                  ----- Orig=
inal Message ----- 
                  From: Soulstice Omega 
              =
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                  Sent: Sunday, March 18, 2=
001 3:17 AM
                  Subject: Re: Big Post(with fries)


         =
         Arrow: Hera that, Airbomber? She USED to be Infectra!

           =
       Airbomber: You can't fool me, you just got someone who sounds just l=
ike her to pose as her...LET ME TALK TO HER!

                  Arrow: Airb=
omber wants to talk to you, Infectra. I mean, Armada...
                   =
 ----- Original Message ----- 
                    From: *Orchid* 
        =
            To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                    Sent: Sunday, M=
arch 18, 2001 3:10 AM
                    Subject: Re: Big Post(with fries)=



                    Armada



                    (Armada listens to the=
 voice coming over her commlink.)


                    Armada: Actually, n=
o. But that was my original name. I'm Armada now. Who is this?


          =
          (Armada says into the commlink and awaits an answer from Arrow.)
=

                      ----- Original Message ----- 
                      =
From: Soulstice Omega 
                      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  =
                    Sent: Saturday, March 17, 2001 10:19 PM
               =
       Subject: Re: Big Post(with fries)


                      Airbomber:=
 But where do we go?

                      Arrow: That's up to you, Airbom=
ber, but I wouldn't lie to you.

                      Train Wreck: Actuall=
y, he WOULD lie to you, but I wouldn't, and I seen this as well.

         =
             Stranato: I didn't see it, but I believe it.

                =
      Airbomber: But how can that be?

                      Arrow: Call he=
r.

                      Airbomber: I tried that.

                      A=
rrow: You don't keep track of those kind of things? I'll call her.

       =
               Arrow calls Armada by commlink.

                      Arrow=
: Is there anyone named Infectra there?...

                        ----- O=
riginal Message ----- 
                        From: Alloran2@... 
    =
                    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                        Sen=
t: Saturday, March 17, 2001 4:56 PM
                        Subject: Big Po=
st(with fries)


                        OOC: Please add the new Destron ba=
se to the events page, Zardus.  Its in 
                        Syria. 

  =
                      :::Ramjet/Wheeljack/Vulois/Time Warp::: 

           =
             Ramjet: The one extremely close to us belongs to the Trainers.=
  They are led 
                        by a bot named Prebon.  They are po=
werful, and are enemies of the Maximals 
                        and Allian=
ce.  The other one is the Blackfortress, the base a large faction 
        =
                of Predacons.  There are three Predacon leaders there, and =
i think we might 
                        be able to work out an Alliance w=
ith them. 
                        ~~~~~ 
                        Wheeljack=
: I'd say a sloping, hill-type shape.(Thanks for the idea Zardus!) 
       =
                 ~~~~~ 
                        Vulois: Yes, lets. I think =
we should first go to the Maximals, for they will 
                        =
be the most likely to cooperate.  Even so, there are a lot of warlike 
    =
                    Maximals, so be ready for anything. 
                  =
      ::he walks out of his cave and starts flying to the CF:: 
           =
             ~~~~~ 
                        ::Time Warp was releived that t=
hey were friends, until he heard what they 
                        said ab=
out Infectra:: 
                        Time Warp: Infectra?! In the Allian=
ce?! I didnt know her very well, but she 
                        definatel=
y wasnt Alliance material!  Lets get out of here Airbomber, these 
        =
                guys are fools.
